Hello! Welcome to my blog. I am The Meridian Sun. Here on this blog you will be able to find my photography work as well as everything i like across the internet world.

a wonderful complexity

| May 21, 2020 | Photography | 1 Comments

A Wonderful Complexity has taken possession of my entire soul, like thes sweet morning of spring of spring wich I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, wich was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that i neglect my talents.

tripping out - led by a dressed monkey

| May 21, 2020 | Videography | No Comments

Filmed on Mars 5, 2020, a mostly first-person chronicle of the day's events leading up to a performance in wollongong, Australia. Shot on Canon 5D mkll with 50mm 1.2 and 24-70 lenses.

flyingpool - goldmine

| May 21, 2020 | Music | No Comments

FlyingPool est un projet dreampop aux accents parfois shoegaze parfois folk et issu de la collaboration entre Elena Lacroix (chant,guitare,clavier) et antoine colen(batterie, guitare),deux multi-instrumentistes qui partagent une même passion: créer des mélodies sensibles et envoutantes. Le groupe est accompagné sur scène d'une série de synthétiseurs pour former des nappes atmosphériques et des basses rondes

a day in the life

| May 21, 2020 | Photography | 4 Comments

He must have tried it a hundred times, shut his eyes so that he wouldn't have to look at the floundering legs, and only stopped when he began to feel a mild, dull pain there he had never felt before.

"Oh, God", he thought, "what a strenuous career it is that I've chosen! Travelling day in andday out."
